item.title: Brinker International Edges Higher After JPMorgan Upgrades Stock To ‘Overweight’
item.description: JPMorgan said it believes casual dining should benefit from low supply growth, value messaging, and tax benefits in 2026.

item.title: Trump Administration Reportedly Planning Another $12 Billion in Clean Energy Funding Cuts
item.description: The new list of clean energy projects that may be slashed follows the Trump administration's announcement of $8 billion in cuts last week.
